content:
# The move command executed successfully, indicating that I am now at the position (-7, -7).
# I will now attempt to place the stone furnace at this position to see if the environment allows for placement from this new location.

# Attempting to place the stone furnace at (-7, -7).
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(-7, -7))  # Placing the stone furnace at the new position. 
print(f'Furnace placement result: {furnace}')  # Confirming the placement of the furnace.
